TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StructureChangedEventHandler(object sender, StructureChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StructureChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub StructureChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As StructureChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void StructureChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, StructureChangedEventArgs ^ e);

Docs.summary: 表示一个由客户端应用程序实现的方法，用于处理 UI 自动化关系树结构发生变化时引起的事件。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 事件接收不同的结构更改的委托中下, 表描述的信息。
|`e.structureChangeType`|`sender`|`e.runtimeId`| |-----------------------------|--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildAdded>|已添加子级。|已添加子级。| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildRemoved>|已删除子级的父级。|已移除的子项。| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenBulkAdded>|已添加的子级的父级。|已添加的子级的父级。| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenBulkRemoved>|已删除的子级的父级。|已删除的子级的父级。| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenInvalidated>|已失效的子级的父级。|已失效的子级的父级|
